name: Fatal Hour: Petroleum
description: Stranded at an abandoned gas station in the middle of nowhere, your mechanic is desperately trying to repair your transportation. There are no other humans in the area. Not living ones at least. Of the other kind there are plenty. And they're hungry...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 8 GB RAM Storage: 4 GB available space
